sentences.en: An old friend of mine, newly spliced, recently invited me to dinner in his new marital home.
sentences.cn: 我的一位刚结婚不久的老朋友最近邀请我到他的婚房去吃晚饭。

sentences.en: Caroline was keen to make her marital home in London.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳渴望婚后把家安在伦敦。

sentences.en: How well off you are in old age is largely determined by race, sex, and marital status.
sentences.cn: 老年生活的幸福程度在很大程度上取决于种族、性别以及婚姻状况。

sentences.en: I knew it all, the whole drab compass of marital disillusion.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地知道婚姻幻灭的单调乏味的境界.

sentences.en: People are prepared to be tolerant of extra-marital peccadilloes by public figures.
sentences.cn: 人们可以容忍公众人物婚外的不检点行为。

sentences.en: questions about age, sex and marital status
sentences.cn: 关于年龄、性别、婚姻状况的问题

sentences.en: She also alluded to her rival's past marital troubles.
sentences.cn: 她还影射了对手过去的婚姻问题。

sentences.en: She would never resort to the law courts to resolve her marital problems.
sentences.cn: 她无论如何不会上法庭解决婚姻问题。

sentences.en: The clamour to draw a veil over the minister's extra-marital activities reeks of hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 想要掩饰部长婚外情的喧嚣叫嚷之声让人倍感虚伪。

sentences.en: The implication that marital infidelity enhances a leader's credibility is preposterous.
sentences.cn: 婚姻不忠会提升领导人可信度的暗示荒谬之极。

sentences.en: The personal allowance depends on your age and marital status.
sentences.cn: 个人免税额的多少取决于年龄和婚姻状况。

sentences.en: Their marital storms are infrequent and quickly lost.
sentences.cn: 他们夫妻间的感情很少掀起狂风巨浪,有也迅即平息.

sentences.en: They cited Alex's refusal to return to the marital home.
sentences.cn: 他们引证了亚历克斯拒绝回到婚后的家中一事。
